bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Gwen Harvey to Philip Showalter Hench, November 5, 1953

div1.p: Harvey informs Hench that she has no control over the release of the "You Are There" film dealing with yellow fever. However, she recommends whom he should contact.

div1.head: Letter from Gwen Harvey to Philip Showalter Hench, November 5, 1953
div1.opener:
WCCO
Radio and Television
50 SOUTH NINTH STREET · MINNEAPOLIS 2, MINNESOTA · LINCOLN 0552
November 5, 1953
Philip S. Hench, M. D.
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
It would have been a great pleasure for me to be able
to reply that I would see to it that you received a
print of the You Are There program for the use you
described in your letter of October 31. However, we
have no control over such a release.

As you will note from the attached copy of my letter
to Mr. Bill Croasdale, I have taken the best means I
know to accomplish it. I hope you will hear favorably
from him.
div1.closer:
Cordially, Gwen Harvey
Program Director
WCCO-TV cc - Mr. Cal Smith
